content:
# We successfully extracted 10 iron plates from each furnace, resulting in an updated inventory of `{'coal': 8, 'iron-ore': 21, 'iron-plate': 45}`.
# The current statuses of the furnaces indicate:
# - The first furnace has 49 coal but is now showing "NO_INGREDIENTS" status, meaning it has no iron ore to smelt.
# - The other furnaces also show "NO_INGREDIENTS" status and have varying amounts of coal remaining.

# Since we have sufficient iron ore in our inventory, we can now supply iron ore to each furnace to resume their operation.
# Let's distribute 5 pieces of iron ore into each furnace that needs it.

for furnace in get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace}):
    insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 iron ore into each furnace.

# After this, we will check the updated inventory and the statuses of the furnaces once more.
print(f"Updated Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Furnace statuses: {[inspect_inventory(furnace) for furnace in get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})]}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
